title: It's a Simple Thing
itunes:title: It's a Simple Thing
description:
When you don’t see a way, know this—God has a way! Let Joel remind you in this motivating message to keep the right perspective during difficulties and trust God. He has the solution.Your best days are still ahead, and together we can make a difference in this world with the message of God's hope and love. To give visit JoelOsteen.com/GiveHope

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
